publication.title: A Digital Real-Time Simulator for Rail-Vehicle Control System Testing
publication.keyword: Control System;Hybrid System;Integration Testing;Power Converter;Real Time Simulation;Vehicle Control;Discrete Event;Hardware In The Loop;Real Time;
publication.abstract: Modern electrical locomotives are powered by controlled power converters. Integration testing of the vehicle control system is performed using real-time simulation. The present contribution presents an evaluation of a digital real-time simulator for this purpose, with particular emphasis on switching and events, which is one of the more demanding tasks in the real-time simulation of hybrid systems.
